name: Lemillion
description: A hero known for his positivity and selfless spirit. His quirk allows him to phase through solid matter, making him one of the most difficult heroes to hit in combat.

name: Deku
description: The successor of the legendary power One For All. Known for his quick thinking and analytical combat approach.

name: Mt. Lady
description: A pro hero capable of growing to a giant size. Known for her flashy entrances and commitment to protecting civilians.
